name: Prynt Corp.
description: Provider of printers for smartphone camera cases designed to print any photo instantly. The company's printers are compatible with iOS and Android phones and pictures have short video clips embedded inside, enabling users to share their memories in a way that is tangible and magical.
one_liner: Provider of printers for smartphone camera cases designed to print any photo instantly. The company's printers are compatible with iOS and Android phones and pictures have short video clips embedded inside, enabling users to share their memories in a way that is tangible and magical.
